brainly_data.question:
Analyze physical activities from which benefits can be derived. 
It is important to participate in a range of exercises to provide a variety of health benefits. Describe two physical activities available to teens and adults in your community that offer different physical benefits, and briefly describe the benefits of each activity
brainly_data.subject: Health

all_answers.question:
Analyze physical activities from which benefits can be derived. 
It is important to participate in a range of exercises to provide a variety of health benefits. Describe two physical activities available to teens and adults in your community that offer different physical benefits, and briefly describe the benefits of each activity
all_answers.subject: Health
all_answers.text:
1. Physical activities that are easily available and can help both teens and adults to strengthen muscles and build bone structure include swimming and playing basketball.
2. Physical activities to lose and maintain recommended healthy weight include Aerobic dancing, jumping rope, and gardening.
